title: Candied Flowers
summary: Need a gluten free, dairy free, fodmap friendly, and vegetarian side dish? Candied Flowers could be a tremendous recipe to try. This recipe serves 1 and costs 28 cents per serving. One portion of this dish contains about 3g of protein, 0g of fat, and a total of 69 calories. A mixture of egg white, proof vodka, superfine sugar, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 15 minutes. It is brought to you by Recipezaar. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 16%, which is not so outstanding.
